reviews.review: LE CS DE LA WW II ! A AVOIR POUR TOUS LES FANS DE FPS !

被Valve遺忘的一款多人連線二戰FPS
遊戲主要以搶旗為主，遊戲風格有點像CS，不過槍支傷害比CS來得高很多，還可以把別人丟過來的芭樂撿起來丟回去

國內目前還有一台伺服器偶爾會滿人，可以考慮敗來玩

不過比起DOD:S，我覺得DOD還是有比較好的設計，只是還有沒有伺服器就不保證了
this is fun
Even though the online activity is dwindling, I greatly enjoy the feel of the game (being a fan of the WWII time period). Bummer that there's no offline bot practice.

Incredibly addictive. The gungame mode is super fast paced and awesome...

Grande jogo de Segunda Guerra Mundial, baseado no mod do Half-Life, recomendo para os jogadores de CS e para os atraidos por Segunda Guerra Mundial.

Great game of World War II, based on the Half-Life mod, I recommend to players of CS and attracted by the Second World War.

I love DoD:S, it was shown to me by a buddy in college. It's a great relatively fast paced shooter with small-ish maps and no vehicles (my favorite style of FPS). There is a rather steep learning curve with some of the guns, but once you get the hang of it, it's really fun. The bad part is multiplayer is dying somewhat, but you can usually still find some servers. It would be a really good LAN game, but nobody ever wants to play it, bwamp.
